item.title: ElementUI 表格数据行内修改方式
item.description: 单列修改 代码 <template> <div class="app-container"> <el-table :data="tableData" border style="width: 60%"> <el-table-column v-for="item of tableCol" :key="item.key" :label="item.label" :prop="item.key" :width="item.width" > <template #default="{ row, $index }"> <div v-if="item.key === 'address'"> <div v-if="addressEditIndex === $index"> <el-input ref="addressInput" v-model="row.address" placeholder="请输入地址" @blur="addressEditIndex = undefined" @change="handleAddressUpdate(row)"
